EmailTemplate.name: 2011_EMS_AAA_Vegas.Invitation
EmailTemplate.subject: Stop by and visit us at Next Week's AAA Annual Conference in Las Vegas
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
November 14-16, 2011 | Las Vegas, NV Stop by Booth #301 at the Ambulance Association Annual Conference Next Week!
Stop by and see us next week (November 14-16) at the American Ambulance Association Annual Conference and visit with TriTech EMS Solutions Sales Director - Karla Hageman, Client Account Manager - Tyler Harman and Product Manager - Dan Voss.
See a demo of our Sweet Billing, Fusion ePCR or VisiCAD solutions. We have options for online or installed applications.
Find out more about all the NAAC-Certified Webinar Recordings we offer to help your office improve their knowledge and skills, and get their CEUs! http://www.tritechems.com/TriTech-University/Webinars.asp
EMS industry experts predict that in the future, integrated, web-based EMS solutions will become the industry standard. TriTech offers these solutions NOW - read more here: http://www.tritechems.com/Products/online.asp
Can't make the conference in Las Vegas next week? Call Us at 800-537-3927
Share with Friends or visit www.tritech.com 9860 Mesa Rim Road | San Diego, CA 92121 | PH: 858.799.7000
